As we have stated before, we keep our citizens who are environmentally friendly out of these events.
They are abusing the intentions of people who are environmentally sensitive. There are some terrorists involved.
They cause innocent people and public goods to be damaged.
The AK Party has made great performances. Both in Turkey and in Istanbul. Such actions are being made to prevent the actions of the AK Party.
We will neither be deceived nor deceived. There is no sense in putting these young people there in a race. With such a logic, the state can not be ruled.
We do rally where we want, we do not allow burning, we do not allow it.
As the AK Party, we have even come to the point of closure, but we have never spilled our people on the streets. We gave our struggle democratically.

I thank you all for this enthusiasm and this wonderful welcome at this hour.
I greet the souls who breathe in every village of the Republic of Turkey, not just you tonight.
I salute your brethren who kneeled on Seccadin, kneeling in the presence of my Lord, praying for them.
I greet all my laboring siblings, who have joined the terrine to the bread, the workers, the peasants.
I greet my younger brothers, who are as big, dignified, and strong as Turkey.
I hope God will keep our brotherhood. I hope my Lord, our alliance, our solidarity, our friendship.
We've always come to do volunteers. But we've always been upright. We will not be able to work with our fighting, fighting, vandalism, shooting and breaking, breaking and pouring.
The interest lobe thinks that by threatening to enter the stock market speculation.
They should know very well: We will not take this nation's food to them
Everyone knows that we have come today to glorify Turkey's brotherhood. We have not distinguished any of the 76 million people.
Some go out and say, "Prime Minister is the prime minister of 50%."
Up until today, we said that we were the servants of 76 million. From the west we took service for the most to the east.
The nation that gives the trust is the nation that will take it. No one outside the nation can extend this emancipation hand.
We can never allow anyone to burn and destroy in this country with vandalism, harming cities and public properties.
The demonstrations, which are said to have been made for a tree that does not even reach the number 15 in the Gezi Park, left behind three losses today.
2 our youth lost their lives, 1 our police became martyrs. The more important the death of these young people is, the more important the death of my police officer.
Our police, who are in charge of ensuring our safety, are standing in front of the terrorist, the anarchist.
This is not going to work for someone. The police say to pull. This is not a passing car, it is the state of the Republic of Turkey.
I am a journalist, an artist, a politician and they have made irresponsible hate, discrimination and provocation.
